get.description: Basic healthcheck
Basic healthcheck that requires authentication
Return basic info about deployment

post.description: Report a heartbeat for a machine

Report that a machine is dead, so that it is removed immediately.

This can be useful when you need the live list to update faster than the timeout.

get.description: Return a list of the active machines

schema.title: Response Get Live Machines Machine Live Get

get.description: Return

Get cpu metrics for certain machines between from_ts to to_ts, inclusive.
:param machine_ids: A list of machine ids to get metrics for. Empty list returns no results (but not an error).
:param from_ts: Start time filter, inclusive. Optional.
:param to_ts: End time filter, inclusive. Optional. If to_ts is before from_ts, there will not be an
              error, but the results will be empty.
:return: Dict of CpuMeasurement objects with machine_id as the key.

schema.title: Response Get Cpu Metrics Machine Metrics Cpu Get

post.description: Put a cpu metric measurement into the datastore

get.description: Get the most recent cpu measurements for each machine

schema.title: Response Get Latest Cpu Metrics Machine Metrics Cpu Latest Get

:param machine_ids: A list of machine ids to get metrics for. Empty list returns no results (but not an error).

:param to_ts: End time filter, inclusive. Optional. If to_ts is before from_ts, there will not be an
              error, but the results will be empty.

schema.title: Response Get Nvidia Smi Metrics Machine Metrics Nvidia Smi Get

post.description: Put a nvidia_smi metric measurement into the datastore

get.description: Get the most recent nvidia_smi measurements for each machine

schema.title: Response Get Latest Nvidia Smi Metrics Machine Metrics Nvidia Smi Latest Get

machine_id.title: Machine Id
machine_id.description: The machine_id of the machine that generated this measurement

cpu_percents.title: Cpu Percents
cpu_percents.description: A list with CPU utilization for each core. Values vary between 0 and 100.

disk_name.title: Disk Name
disk_name.description: The name of the disk, e.g. /dev/sda.

machine_id.title: Machine Id
machine_id.description: The machine_id of the machine that generated this measurement

iops.title: Iops
iops.description: A dict of IOPS for each disk. Each disk will have an entry in the dict with the disk name as the key.

disk_name.title: Disk Name
disk_name.description: The name of the disk, e.g. /dev/sda.

read_mbps.title: Read Mbps
read_mbps.description: The read throughput for the disk in MiB/s.

write_mbps.title: Write Mbps
write_mbps.description: The write throughput for the disk in MiB/s.

machine_id.title: Machine Id
machine_id.description: The machine_id of the machine that generated this measurement

throughput.title: Throughput
throughput.description: A dict with disk throughput for each disk with the disk name as the key.

disk_name.title: Disk Name
disk_name.description: The name of the disk, e.g. /dev/sda.

used_mb.title: Used Mb
used_mb.description: The used disk space in MiB.

total_mb.title: Total Mb
total_mb.description: The total space of the disk in MiB.

machine_id.title: Machine Id
machine_id.description: The machine_id of the machine that generated this measurement

usage.title: Usage
usage.description: A dict with disk usage for each disk with the disk name as the key.

used_mb.title: Used Mb
used_mb.description: The used GPU memory in MiB.

total_mb.title: Total Mb
total_mb.description: The total GPU memory in MiB.

machine_id.title: Machine Id
machine_id.description: The machine_id of the machine that generated this measurement

memory.title: Memory
memory.description: A list with GPU memory usage for each GPU. There will be one entry per GPU. The order of the GPUs is the same as in the output of nvidia-smi.

machine_id.title: Machine Id
machine_id.description: The machine_id of the machine that generated this measurement

gpu_percents.title: Gpu Percents
gpu_percents.description: A list with GPU utilization for each GPU. The values varys from 0 to 100. There will be one entry per GPU. The order of the GPUs is the same as in the output of nvidia-smi.

MachineInfo.title: MachineInfo
MachineInfo.description: Information about a machine's current state

MachineRegistrationInfo.title: MachineRegistrationInfo
MachineRegistrationInfo.description:
Information about a machine to register with the control plane.

Same as machine heartbeat, but without a few fields that are either set via URL params or
automatically set server-side.

machine_id.title: Machine Id
machine_id.description: The machine_id of the machine that generated this measurement

machine_id.title: Machine Id
machine_id.description: The machine_id of the machine that generated this measurement

per_interface.title: Per Interface
per_interface.description: A dict with throughput for each network interface with the interface name as the key

total.description: The total throughput for all interfaces summed over all interfaces.

machine_id.title: Machine Id
machine_id.description: The machine_id of the machine that generated this measurement

output.title: Output
output.description: The output of nvidia-smi as a string.

interface_name.title: Interface Name
interface_name.description: The name of the network interface, e.g. eth0.

sent_mbps.title: Sent Mbps
sent_mbps.description: The sent throughput for the interface in MiB/s.

recv_mbps.title: Recv Mbps
recv_mbps.description: The received throughput for the interface in MiB/s.
